  1. Linux Apt

    the difference between apt-get update and apt-get upgrade link apt-get update updates the list of available packages and their versions, but it does not install or upgrade any packages. apt-get upgrade actually installs newer versions of the packages you have. After updating the lists, the package manager knows about available updates for the software you have installed. This is why you first want to update.

    2017/03/11

  10. SJTU 第19周
